name: Iain Watters
about: Iain appeared in the 2014 series of the Great British Bake Off.

Growing up just outside of Belfast, Iain’s parents are passionate about organic foods and this outlook has directly affected his style of baking. His passion for travelling has taken him to all corners of the globe and he brings these unique flavours to his bakes.
Now living in London, Iain is a construction engineer and brings an array of bakes in for his colleagues on the construction sites.

Iain’s mum taught him everything he knows about baking and he keeps all of her traditional recipes, sending her pictures of his bakes back home. He loves to bake breads and cakes and especially enjoys using vegetables in his bakes. He baked his older brother’s wedding cake and dreams of opening a cafe in East London.
